entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: W 55 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
